div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 512 Bucovat, 4 km. WSW of Craiova, Ru- mania, 1910-1920 Burial: c. 150-125 B.C. (T) Contents: AR. Pot hoard, largely dispersed Macedonia, 1st Region: tetradr. Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) 2 Winkler, SCSCluj 1955, p. 98 â€ Mitrea, SCIV 1971, p. 118, illus.
